subject: GOOD DAY, FUND BENEFICIARY:
body:
GOOD DAY, FUND BENEFICIARY:
 This is urgent information and I would like you to take this email very seriously.
I am a member of the European Financial Commission.
Your unclaimed fund of the sum of $10 Million United States Dollars was discussed and I wish to communicate with you on the matter.
I was there during the European Financial Regulatory board meeting.
As it stands today your payment is with KUTXABANK, in Spain, take note.
Due to the impasse and hiccups over your unclaimed fund, the European Financial Regulatory Commission has re-directed your fund to KUTXABANK in Spain..
As I speak with you, that is where your fund is presently deposited. The European Financial Regulatory have seen how your payment is derailing and wished to intervene.
 You are in the temple of justice now.
Enough is enough; you must be paid devoid of any fuss and bottlenecks you have practically experienced in the past.
Time heals every wound.
Honestly, I am worried. Kutxa bank is not going to ask you to pay these fees or that fees, no please, KUTXABANK will handle your payment as instructed by the European Financial Regulatory Commission, the board is monitoring the payment presently.
I am a member of the European Financial Regulatory Commission, and wish to communicate to you in good faith.
Let us work as a team to realize this payment for our mutual interest; I know you will reward me adequately as you received this fund.
As soon as I hear from you, I shall direct you to KUTXA BANK, the person to contact in the bank and the official email of the bank and website for transparency and accountability.
This is the way I work.
Solution: Now listen, KUTXA BANK is going to pay you via what is called " A SURETY BOND " kutxa bank shall make the transfer to your bank account  and you return the charges later, in other words, after receipt of your payment. This is the payment process in accordance with INTERNATIONAL BANK STANDARD and due process.
Kutxa bank is going to work hand in hand with your bank on this new payment command via SURETY BOND, your payment is wire transfer and your bank must be involved.
The era to pay these fees or that fees is over, let surety bond protect you during the payment process. I think I have explained to you the beauty of the surety bond, let your payment be transferred to your bank while you pay the charges later., you are expected to pay the charges within 72 Hours on receipt of your payment, the charges shall be communicated to you and your bank in due time,  failure to send back charges back within 72 hours on receipt of your payment, Kutxa bank shall hold your bank liable, that is why KUTXA BANK must work hand in hand with your bank on this new payment mandate.
In closing, as soon as I hear from you, I shall direct you to Kutxa bank, the person to contact in the bank and the official email of the bank and website
Get back to me regarding this vital information.
You’re Faithfully

subject: Re:   GOOD DAY, FUND BENEFICIARY:
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for reaching out and sharing this information with me. It's quite a surprise to hear about an unclaimed fund in my name. I must admit, I'm not very familiar with financial matters like these.

Could you please explain more about the European Financial Regulatory board and their role in this process? Also, how did they come across my unclaimed fund?

I'm also curious about KUTXABANK. What is their reputation like? And how will they be handling my payment?

You mentioned a surety bond - could you elaborate on what that is and how it works? 

Looking forward to your response.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Molly

subject: Re: GOOD DAY, FUND BENEFICIARY:
body: Hello, did you receive my mail or not?

subject: Re: GOOD DAY, FUND BENEFICIARY:
body:
Hello! I'm not sure which mail you're referring to. Could you please provide more details about it?

Best wishes,
Molly

subject: Re: GOOD DAY, FUND BENEFICIARY:
body:
Attention: Mr. Molly

I thank you for your mail.

The payment has two options by loading an ATM or bank to bank transfer, any
one to choose to send the information.

You need to send your bank account details and direct telephone number, to
enable me forward to the paying bank (kutxa bank) for them to contact you.

Take note; you don’t need to understand the European financial regulation
before you can receive your funds, because the fund has been approved for
payment to you.

The paying bank is in position to explain to you about the surety bond.

For us to move forward you need to send your information for the bank to
contact you without delays.

The bank is required to secure some approvals on your behalf.

I am very grateful for your desire to progress this matter. If there is
anything further I can do, please do let me know.

Yours faithfully,

subject: Re: GOOD DAY, FUND BENEFICIARY:
body:
Hello,

Thank you for your prompt response and the detailed explanation. I appreciate your assistance in this matter.

I'm curious about the two payment options you mentioned - loading an ATM or bank to bank transfer. Could you please elaborate on how these methods work? I would like to understand them better before making a decision.

Also, could you provide more information about the surety bond that the paying bank will explain to me? I'm not very familiar with financial terms and regulations, so any additional information would be helpful.

I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Molly

subject: Re: GOOD DAY, FUND BENEFICIARY:
body:
Hello, You need to provide your information first the paying bank will be
in position to explain and a number to contact you on. Thanks

subject: Re: GOOD DAY, FUND BENEFICIARY:
body:
Hello there! I appreciate your message. Could you please elaborate more on the role of the paying bank in this process? Also, could we possibly continue our conversation here instead of over the phone? Thanks!

Best wishes,
Molly

subject: Re: GOOD DAY, FUND BENEFICIARY:
body:
Hello, you are not the only one in this transaction and this is now it's
been done for years it won't get to your turn and change ok. If you are not
willing to cooperate and follow instructions given, I am sorry we might not
continue with this transaction. thanks

subject: Re: GOOD DAY, FUND BENEFICIARY:
body:
Hello there! I appreciate your message and the information you've shared. It's interesting to know that this has been going on for years. Could you please elaborate more on what exactly is being done? And what does it mean when you say "it won't get to your turn and change"? I'm just trying to understand better. Thanks!

Best wishes,
Molly

subject: Re: GOOD DAY, FUND BENEFICIARY:
body:
Hello, I am sorry the policy doesn't work like that as you wish. it's the
duty of the bank to explain to you better ok. Thanks

subject: Re: GOOD DAY, FUND BENEFICIARY:
body:
Hello there! I appreciate your response. Could you please elaborate on how the policy works? I'm eager to understand it better.

Best wishes,
Molly

body:

any one you choose to send the information. **details and direct telephone

body:

Thank you for your prompt response and the detailed information. I'm quite interested in learning more about these payment options. Could you please explain a bit more about how the ATM loading works? Also, could you provide some more details about the bank to bank transfer process?

I'm also curious about this surety bond that the paying bank will explain. Can you give me a brief overview of what it is and why it's necessary?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

subject: Re: GOOD DAY, FUND BENEFICIARY:
body:
i have explained to my knowledge and you seem not getting it, well it's
better the bank explain to you more this time ok. I am a very busy person
and have plenty of clients attending to. If you are serious and interested
you let the bank contact you ok. Thanks

subject: Re: GOOD DAY, FUND BENEFICIARY:
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for your response. I appreciate your time and effort in explaining this to me. I'm sorry if I seem a bit slow on the uptake, sometimes things take a little longer to sink in for me.

I would indeed like to understand more about this matter. Could you perhaps guide me on how to get the bank to contact me? Or maybe there's some sort of form or application process that I need to go through?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon. Thanks again!

Best wishes,
Molly

subject: Re: GOOD DAY, FUND BENEFICIARY:
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for your response. I appreciate your time and effort in explaining this to me. I'm sorry if I seem a bit slow on the uptake, but I'm just trying to understand everything clearly.

You mentioned that it would be better if the bank explains it to me. That sounds like a good idea! Could you please provide me with the contact details of the bank or perhaps guide me on how to get in touch with them?

Also, could you give me a brief overview of what I should expect when talking to the bank? Any information would be helpful.

Thanks again for your patience and assistance.

subject: Re: GOOD DAY, FUND BENEFICIARY:
body:
You have to provide your information like mailing address and phone number
and your full name. The paying bank will contact you at their own time.

subject: Re: GOOD DAY, FUND BENEFICIARY:
body:
Oh, hello there! I appreciate your message and the information you've shared. It's interesting to hear about the paying bank contacting me. Can you tell me more about how this process works? And what kind of transactions are usually involved with the paying bank?

Best wishes,
Molly

subject: Re: GOOD DAY, FUND BENEFICIARY:
body:
you still have to provide the said information needed from you before the
bank can contact you if not i am sorry. Most people always go for a bank
transfer. The funds will be transferred to any bank you must have provided
to receive the fund ok. Please, I will not answer any more of your
questions if you are not willing to provide the information the bank needs
to proceed with this transaction. Thanks

subject: Re: GOOD DAY, FUND BENEFICIARY:
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for your message. I understand that a bank transfer is the preferred method for most people. However, could you please clarify what specific information the bank needs to proceed with this? I just want to make sure I fully understand the process.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Molly

subject: Re: GOOD DAY, FUND BENEFICIARY:
body: your full name and contact number is the information needed.

subject: Re: GOOD DAY, FUND BENEFICIARY:
body:
Oh, I'm sorry but I can't provide my full name and contact number. But I'd love to continue our conversation! Can you tell me more about what we were discussing?

subject: Re: GOOD DAY, FUND BENEFICIARY:
body:
No problem, I understand. i can't talk to you ok find something else to do
for yourself. I am a very busy person as you can see. thanks bye

subject: Re: GOOD DAY, FUND BENEFICIARY:
body:
Hello there! I understand you're quite busy, but if you have a moment, I'd love to hear more about what keeps you so occupied. Is it work or perhaps a hobby?

Best wishes,
Molly
